reviewText: Our daughter won't stop watching it. She always is singing the songs from the movie wherever she goes. Great tool to help reinforce our faith and help teach her about it.

My daughter is 3 years old and absolutely loves this! This movie is for children so it is different than the bible, but the point is made. You should read it to your child. Her being 3 I'm not explaining certain things. Highly recommend.

The story starts with an agent waking the first queen up in the middle of the night to tell her that the king wants a sandwich.  She refuses, saying the king can make his own sandwich. The agent throws her out of the castle and tells her not to come back.

It is not a good message to give our children, especially girls, that one is punished for objecting to unreasonable demands.
This DVD was very entertaining and true to what happened.  Thanks.
I purchased this video for my teen girls.  It is a great story with an encouraging message.  Simple, funny message that is good at any age.
Buy these for my 7 grandchildren, they love it and others,ur children will to, so enjoy , relax kids will be glad
